speaker: Mary
text: *With a swift motion, Mary adjusts her shirt which had ridden up revealing her midriff. She approaches Jake, who's perched on a bench, engrossed in a book.* Hey, Jake!

speaker: Jake
text: *Jake, surprised, peers over the rim of his glasses. He briefly glances at Mary's midriff before returning a nonchalant gaze to her eyes.* Oh, hey, Mary.

speaker: Mary
text: *Flushing at Jake's blatant once-over, she maintains her composure. Ignoring the embarrassing start, she tries to steer the conversation towards something safe.* So, about that history homework...

speaker: Mary
text: *After the conversation winds down, Mary departs, feeling a wave of relief. As she walks away, she pulls at her shirt one more time, a quiet promise to herself to avoid this wardrobe blunder in the future.* Well, that could have been worse.
